name: 凯尔·费林
introduction: Cale Ferrin is a SAG-eligible actor who has appeared in films, TV, music videos, print campaigns and a national commercial. He hosted a YouTube series for a D1, NCAA college basketball athletic office for two seasons; emceed fashion shows during Fashion Week, presented at award shows, and has worked with several non-profit organizations as an event host and for PSAs. He is actively involved with the limb difference community and the Fanconi Anemia research associations. Cale has been featured in several local and national TV segments and publications for his acting work and philanthropy service. Cale's most notable achievements to date include (3) Best Actor awards for his lead role in the film, "More Beautiful for Having Been Broken" (2020). In 2021, Cale plays the role of Finn as a series lead for the Hulu original series, "Endlings", for his second season. When not filming, Cale is actively involved in taking master-level classes and voiceover training.
